code: import{useMemo}from'react';import moment from'moment';var useColumns=function useColumns(){return useMemo(function(){return[{title:'Data',dataIndex:'createAt',key:'createAt',align:'center',width:140,render:function render(createAt){if(!createAt)return null;return moment(createAt).utc().format('DD/MM/YYYY HH:mm');}},{title:'Ação',dataIndex:'action',align:'center',render:function render(action){return action.action_name;}},{title:'Módulo',dataIndex:'module',align:'center',render:function render(module){return module.module_name;}},{title:'Usuário',dataIndex:'user',ellipsis:true,render:function render(user){return user.user_name;}},{title:'Email',dataIndex:'user',ellipsis:true,render:function render(user){return user.user_email;}},{title:'Ações Realizadas',dataIndex:'record',ellipsis:true,render:function render(record){var _record$,_record$$description;return(_record$=record[0])===null||_record$===void 0?void 0:(_record$$description=_record$.description)===null||_record$$description===void 0?void 0:_record$$description.replace(/\\n/,'');}}];},[]);};export default useColumns;
